title: Giant Anthem Advance Pro 29 drops Maestro, gains new Fox Live Valve 1.5 smart suspension system
content:
Always looking for that edge over the competition, Giant just unveiled the newest version of their Anthem XC race bike. Citing increased “speeds, technical challenges, and level of competition,” Giant has updated the already-quick Anthem to take on modern XC race courses. Those updates not only include an all-new suspension layout, but an updated Fox

The post Giant Anthem Advance Pro 29 drops Maestro, gains new Fox Live Valve 1.5 smart suspension system appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
